GenMonitorProp.Label: Host Name
GenMonitorProp.Name: _hostname
GenMonitorProp.Description: the IP address or host name that will be pinged (examples: 206.168.191.21 or demo.siteview.com)

GenMonitorProp.Label: Update every
GenMonitorProp.Name: _frequency
GenMonitorProp.Description: amount of time between checks of a monitor

GenMonitorProp.Label: Title
GenMonitorProp.Name: _name
GenMonitorProp.Description: title that should appear in the Monitor table (optional)

AdvanceMonitorProp.Label: Disable
AdvanceMonitorProp.Name: _disabled
AdvanceMonitorProp.Description: temporarily disable monitor sampling and alerting

AdvanceMonitorProp.Label: Timeout
AdvanceMonitorProp.Name: _timeout
AdvanceMonitorProp.Description: the time out per packet, in milliseconds, to wait for ping replies

AdvanceMonitorProp.Label: Size
AdvanceMonitorProp.Name: _packetSize
AdvanceMonitorProp.Description: the size, in bytes, of the ping message

AdvanceMonitorProp.Label: Verify Error
AdvanceMonitorProp.Name: _verifyError
AdvanceMonitorProp.Description: if the monitor detects an error, immediately perform the check again to verify the error. WARNINGS: (1) Activating this feature will cause the logging of this monitor's initial error state to be skipped. Potentially valuable statistical information will be lost. (2) This feature causes immediate re-execution of the monitor. Promiscuous use of this feature may delay the scheduled runs of other monitors. (3) This feature is independent from the Update every (on errors) feature below.

AdvanceMonitorProp.Label: Update every (on errors)
AdvanceMonitorProp.Name: _errorFrequency
AdvanceMonitorProp.Description: the amount of time between checks whenever the status of the monitor is not ok; the Update value from above is used if this is left blank

AdvanceMonitorProp.Label: Schedule
AdvanceMonitorProp.Name: _schedule
AdvanceMonitorProp.Description: schedule for the monitor to be enabled - for example, "weekdays, 9-6" enables the monitor to run from 9am to 6pm, Monday - Friday
AdvanceMonitorProp.ScalarName: every day, all day^every day, 09:00-18:00^every day, 18:00-09:00^weekdays, all day^weekdays, 09:00-18:00

AdvanceMonitorProp.Label: Monitor Description
AdvanceMonitorProp.Name: _monitorDescription
AdvanceMonitorProp.Description: additional description of monitor that appears on Monitor Detail page (optional)

AdvanceMonitorProp.Label: Report Description
AdvanceMonitorProp.Name: _description
AdvanceMonitorProp.Description: additional description of monitor that appears on Reports and in monitor popup info (optional)

AdvanceMonitorProp.Label: Depends On
AdvanceMonitorProp.Name: _dependsOn
AdvanceMonitorProp.Description: Choose the monitor that this monitor depends on

AdvanceMonitorProp.Label: Depends Condition
AdvanceMonitorProp.Name: _dependsCondition
AdvanceMonitorProp.Description: If OK, this monitor is only enabled if the Depends On monitor is OK.
